data.actual_result: The app reloads and you have to call the user again
data.expected_result: The app shouldn’t reload and you should be able to continue your call
data.short_description: Discord crashes when granting it permission to access the camera during a video call, iPhone 8/8 Plus only
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings and make sure Discord doesn’t have permission to access your camera - Start a video call with someone and press the camera icon at the bottom - Grant Discord permission to access your camera - Switch back to Discord
